website_summaries.verdict: Great entry to the world of high-end speakers. Tower speakers sound much better than smaller bookshelf models.
pros: Very good upgrade potential if you want to expand your system
cons: Doesn't come with a dedicated subwoofer

website_summaries.verdict: You can't beat Fluance's rock-bottom pricing, solid construction, and sound quality, which rivals that of more expensive speakers.
cons: The system doesn't include a subwoofer

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Received the Fluance speakers earlier than expected. Packing was great, speakers arrived in excellent condition. Have them hooked up to replace small home theater in a box set of speakers. Good clarity. I went a step further and ordered a stereo equalizer so I could customize the sound and make is more crisp. I wear hearing aids, so sound shaping is important to enjoying home theater and music. I believe the Fluance speakers provide very good bang for the buck for a modest sized (13' x 19') listening area, along with a subwoofer.
customer_reviews.author: Arlo

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Well Built Speaker; Be Sure you have a subwoofer to complete this kit
customer_reviews.text: Product is constructed from quality materials and is assembled with tight tolerances; Top grade composite speaker cabinet with solid posts that accept wide array of connectors. I was looking to upgrade my existing speakers to match the high definition receiver and 4k TV. After researching multiple sites as kept returning to these moderately priced speakers. I do agree with earlier comments about the need for a subwoofer to complete this system. I happen to have a wonderful Klispch 8 inch powered sub that makes these speakers sound like those costing twice the price Attention to detail is extends to the packaging for shipment. Completely cushioned in high density polystyrene and heavy cardboard. Hi
customer_reviews.author: michael k.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice speaker, especially for the money. I am not a big audiophile, but they seem great. They are well put together. They look great in my living room. The sound is wonderful. The box was beat up when delivered, but the packaging was outstanding so not even close to effecting the speakers. Two side notes. First the feet on these are sharp so if you have a hardwood floor take that into account Second I am not sure if it is me, but the banana clips I was going to use to not plug in all the way.
customer_reviews.author: James Hyland

customer_reviews.title: Best value speakers on the planet
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a great purchase. These are the best value speakers on the planet. The sound is so clear and clean... zero distortion. I can't be happier with the sound field created by these speakers. I know at least 3 people who has heard my system is purchasing a set for themselves. Fluance needs to advertise their products more... you will sell your products.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Overstreet

customer_reviews.title: High quality, good price..
customer_reviews.text: High quality and good for the price, this was great addition to my home theater.. I wanted something temporary to watch the world cup, but I am going to keep them forever! My only concern is the buzz sounds that comes from the back surround speakers, when I put them on High volume..I don't set the speakers that high but I didn't just for testing..overall I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Im very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Im very happy with this product. I hope this company does well because they make a quality product that exceeds the price in my opinion. I would recomend adding a sub like other reviewers suggested then again i love bass. I added a Klipsch R-12SW sub coupled with a Denon AVR-2300w receiver all from amazon. My wife and I are enjoying an authoritive, submersive movie experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nuance of the Fluance
customer_reviews.text: Our audio system CAN rattle the whole house but it's at a normal volume that we enjoy every nuance of the movies we missed with our old Yamaha system. Also, these are some of the prettiest speakers I've ever seen. Lifetime warranty. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Celina A.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Have not upgraded my speakers the way i should have (speakers were last on my list) and the ones I had were in major need to be replaced asap! Lol Old Fisher speakers that have out lived there purpose I saw these and thought about it for a month or so...............Klipsch(is a great option) just not in the budget, so i settled on these Fluance 5.0 (already have a sub(dual subs). The sound was much better than i excepted (movie time was marvelous) plus my current sat speakers are the perfect match for these!
customer_reviews.author: rich williams

customer_reviews.title: For the price IMO they are great speakers once broken in
customer_reviews.text: Break in is very important with Fluance speakers. For the price IMO they are great speakers once broken in, the some what over taking bass goes away. The sound coming from each speaker when is should is very good. The timbre matching is very good but center speaker lacks here. I did add a Polk 505 sub in place of the Fluance so I can't say much there. I am very pleased with the Fluance speakers I have also added bipolar speakers into the system they are very non-directional.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher ---------

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic upgrade to my home theater
customer_reviews.text: These speakers arrived fast and in great condition. Packing was fantastic with plenty of foam and some good placement go a long way. The speakers sound amazing and are a massive upgrade over the old ones I had from a pack in with an old receiver. Look great, feel great and sound great. What more could one want?
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy51806

customer_reviews.title: Real Decent
customer_reviews.text: "Poor man's Paradigms" as quoted by another reviewer was right on the money. Good entry level system for a smaller space or low ceiling room. My system is in the secondary family room, not larger living room. Extremely surprised with the quality of the components at this price point. Plays bright as expected at this driver size (keep in mind with no acoustical treatments in the space). Cabinets are not trash either. System is set up with a Definitive Technologies Pro1000 subwoofer. Replaced the center channel with a better unit also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them and enjoy!!
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers, bought a 7 piece set in mahogany wood, waiting on a few subs to pair up with a denon 910w... got the bi-pair also for the rear surrounds.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Adams

customer_reviews.title: Nice sounding speakers
customer_reviews.text: I got these speakers to enhance our movie watching, and they met and exceeded expectations. I planned on adding a sub, but the bass is very good from these speakers, so I don't feel that need.
customer_reviews.author: S. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great value, nice quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: I use this set up in my bedroom. The sound is clear and rich, with the help of a Fluance powered sub. The drivers have a good construction, and they work well with only moderate power. I would recommend these speakers, and Fluance in general, to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lackey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speakers for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely gorgeous speakers. The sound is crisp for the mid-high range. I’ve received compliments from everyone who has visited. For the price range, you can’t beat these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Michael VanPay

customer_reviews.title: I'm extremely happy with the quality and sound of this system
customer_reviews.text: For anyone looking for an affordable speaker system, look no farther. I'm extremely happy with the quality and sound of this system. I added a 12" powered bass to mine and it sounds fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: RL Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Very good speakers
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sound great, and a terrific value. I have them hooked up to a Denon AVR-X3300 and I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Thorbjorn Finnbogason

customer_reviews.title: These speakers are awesome, hooked to my denon AVR with Boston subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are awesome, hooked to my denon AVR with Boston subwoofer. Totally I’m satisfied with the sound outcome as I watch my fav movie Law Abiding Citizen..I highly recommend this 5.0 fluance home theater...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customejoeferr

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING....but be sure you have a subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This is the first set of speakers I've purchased without auditioning and let me tell you...I'm absolutely blown away. The sound is so much fuller than the Klipsch system I had installed before. Keep in mind though, this system will require a sub. Without a subwoofer, the low end on the towers isn't good enough for a home theater setup.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sounding speakers for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and sounding speakers for the money. Highly recommend. Paired with Sony STRDN1080 receiver and they sound great. Would recommend a subwoofer with this system for extra punch although its not required for good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Savarese

customer_reviews.title: Both sound and pricetag are impressive.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the price. Only 4 stars because the woofers on one tower weren't working upon receipt because a wire was off one of the speaker terminals inside the enclosure. Pushed it back on and yay they work. If u want great sound without the pricetag, here u go.
customer_reviews.author: Cullin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sounding speakers!!
customer_reviews.text: Yoooo these speakers are great! Easy to hook up and they sound amazing! We live in a 2 bedroom house I put the sound up to full blast could hear it all through the house and even outside with the doors closed to the house (not that I’m ever going to have them blasting that loudly) but super amazing sound quality. I connected them to a Sony amplifier.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnie

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice finish, and sound. Packaged in 2 boxes with styrofoam case and wrapped in plastic. Great purchase you cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great and clear sound.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Best I have heard. Price or not, these sound great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hollis J. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are great for the price. 5 day delivery. They sound very good without breaking the bank. Highly recommended !!!
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: One of the fastest delivery times EVER.  With the quickness.  Fluance does not mess around.
customer_reviews.text: Breaking them in slow and so far the sound is awesome. Clear. Clean. No muddiness. Compliments my woofers well. I am very pleased. We'll see how long.
customer_reviews.author: E.B.

customer_reviews.title: Speaker system is like being @ carnegie hall
customer_reviews.text: From the packaging to the wood finish this system is first class in looks ,sound and easy set uo . A True EARGAZYM that brings Hollywood and Carnegie Hall right through the surround sound into your brain ... Would never buy any other brand kudos Fluance .. Forget spending 10000 of dollars on Bose , FLUANCE rocks .My audiophile friends could not believe the sounds and beauty of this system ...
customer_reviews.author: Frank R Linet

customer_reviews.title: quality speakers
customer_reviews.text: The speakers came very well packed and very good quality; the sound is very excellent and the speakers are made out of real wood. If anyone is looking for good speakers I would highly recommend this company. You won't be just appointed. Love them.Very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: I want to also reiterate that the packaging and shipping were better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Thses speaker were above and beyond what i was expecting, especially in this price range. I want to also reiterate that the packaging and shipping were better than expected. Thank you for cutting the middle man and allowing people that don't want to spends thousands, have very good quality equipment at a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jagged Husker

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The SXHTB+ speakers are a very good value for the cost. Sound is not colored, and very clear. I would recommend that you need a subwoofer with these speakers as the bass component is a bit weak, but I imagine most customers either have a sub, or are buying one at the same time. I would definitely recommend these speakers in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: R. Newell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are amazing live the sound...really glad i made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Juan suliveras

customer_reviews.title: Sounds awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers rock! They are sturdy and attractive. Setup was extremely easy and instructions from my receiver helped to get the sound set up just right. My music sounds awesome and with the shades drawn I can watch movies and feel like I'm in a really cozy personal theater. This is one of the better purchases I've made.
customer_reviews.author: IMP

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I love the speakers they sound great they're worth Every penny in my opinion They live up to what they claim However the Subwofer is a little quiet But still works great
customer_reviews.author: James porter

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are a part of my Home theater/media room. They deliver excellent sound at all volumes for dialogue, special effects and music.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on the wall and sound is equally awesome
customer_reviews.text: Can't coomplain. Fit the bill for which it was intended. Looks great on the wall and sound is equally awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Lennox Adundo

customer_reviews.title: Fluance Speakers Rock!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of Fluance bookshelf speakers a few months back, and I was so impressed that I purchased Fluance home theater speakers and a Fluance subwoofer from Amazon. These speakers are extremely well-built, and they look beautiful. The shipping time is very quick, and the speakers are packed very well in double boxes. I have been most impressed with the sound quality produced by Fluance speakers. You can't beat this quality in this price range. I'll bet when more people become aware of how good Fluance speakers are, the price will go up dramatically. Get them now!
customer_reviews.author: Melvin-23

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for a small/medium sized room and excellent speakers for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my small roomed home theater. Hooked up with a Marantz NR1504 receiver and a Theater Solutions 12" sub, they reproduce great theater sound.
customer_reviews.author: drbob

customer_reviews.title: Best quality sound for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best quality sound for the money. Had these for over two years now! I really pound out music, games and movies on really high volume on a weekly basis. No distortion and no infamous crackling and buzzing noises from wear. Sound is incredible even without a sub-woofer.
customer_reviews.author: kev

customer_reviews.title: The sound from these speakers is crisp and clear without ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound from these speakers is crisp and clear without being harsh. I've heard nuances in music for the first time that I've been listening to for years. Worth the price for sure.
customer_reviews.author: forester45

customer_reviews.title: 3 years and still going! No loss of quality!
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for three years!! They are perfect for home theatre or listening to music!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn C.

customer_reviews.title: Speakers are great. Had an issue with one of the packages ...
customer_reviews.text: Speakers are great. Had an issue with one of the packages being damaged. Fluance was great about resolving the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Green

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers. I purchased a Fluance sub about 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers. I purchased a Fluance sub about 6 months ago and loved it. Decided to get some towers by them, found a package deal instead. I replaced a set of Polk 65t and 15c, blows the Polks away. I am driving them with an Emotiva Fusion 8100, sounds amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Coopakazie

customer_reviews.title: Great detail in the sound at this price point
customer_reviews.text: Unbeatable value for the money. Great detail in the sound at this price point. Cabinets are as solid as they come. Looks like they will last for 40 years.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bohach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are the best at a great price I would recommend these speakers to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: kevin mack

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speakers! Same quality as more expensive brands at hundreds less! I now have 4 receivers and complementing speakers hooked to up in my office and home!
customer_reviews.author: New Creations Counseling LLC

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers...read why
customer_reviews.text: I found myself in desperate need of some garage/man cave/workshop/after party speakers and came across these bad mama jamas. First off, like the classic jeep wagoneer showed us, you can't go wrong with wood grain. So even if the speakers were total foreign garbage they would still get points for sex appeal. Secondly, they sound gr-8.
customer_reviews.author: Mason D Culver

customer_reviews.title: Best Speaker System I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: This speaker set is the best quality and best looking set of speakers I have ever purchased. With the price being affordable, I was able to purchase a Sub to go with the set. I have had this set for over a year now and I still feel they are of better quality than any store bought brand. With the ability to double wire each speaker, I can provide more power to the speakers and thus there is more sound definition. I will buy Fluance for my speakers from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Fluance SXHTB+ 5 Speaker Surround Sound: Had these just over a year now and happy to say they are awesome! Very clear and accurate, and work well with my Polk Audio PSW5005 12inch woofer. Look nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers, and great price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great Sound. Craftsmanship of speakers fantastic. Price of speakers absolutely a great bonus.
customer_reviews.author: james harris

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Big, heavy, sturdy, and the sound quality is great. The only problem is a subwoofer is definitely needed with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Wadi

customer_reviews.title: Nice. made in China not Canada
customer_reviews.text: Nice. made in China not Canada. Tweeters are a bit brittle sounding (on floorstanding speakers, I have not hitched up the others yet), but overall nice, good crisp base. I got the lighter finish for $299, excellent value!. I have the $500 (mader in Canada floor standing speakers by Fluance, and they are simply outstanding. Also, very well packaged... Very happy with this company!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Speakers sound good for the price
customer_reviews.text: High rating for receiving order promptly. Speakers sound good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: First, I'm no audiophile, but I do like good sound. These speakers are wonderfully made. Look fantastic. Sound awesome. And they are inexpensive compared to the other high end brands. They are shipped in two boxes and the packing protects the speakers very well. Pair these with a good subwoofer and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Dreyer

customer_reviews.title: Was hesitant but I'm so glad i went for it!
customer_reviews.text: I gotta say.. WOW. I was so worried the wooden color would look cheap but it's a very nice wood color! The reviews said some of the posts were loose but mine were perfect. The sound: amazing! I set it up and it sounds magnificent for the price. I thought I might need a subwoofer but this works perfectly without one. I ended up getting the f12 and it's overkill in my apartment. These speakers not only look and sound amazing the warranty is also great! The towers are heavy which is great because I was afraid I would knock them down. I totally recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Jawad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build quality and awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised. These speakers can compare and exceed expectations of any high brand speakers. Excellent build quality and awesome sound.
customer_reviews.author: Prasenjit

customer_reviews.title: The only thing better than the looks of these speakers are their sound
customer_reviews.text: The only thing better than the looks of these speakers are their sound. I will definitely be adding a matching sub to this setup...
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous looking
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous sounding. Researched on line or mid priced system. Found Fluance and couldn't be happier. Great sound, great looks. I wired them conventionally, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: howard jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Flaunce Good cheap speakers.
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have really good sound for bargin speakers. Unless you are a tech junkie, good luck telling the difference between these or some expensive model?
customer_reviews.author: Scott Teague

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable speakers!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and the speakers sound great. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Sound production is outstanding. Easy set up. I highly recommend these speakers. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Edris K.

customer_reviews.title: Very likely best possible value for money
customer_reviews.text: These are certainly not the best speakers on the market (considering surround sound systems regularly exceed $1000 by more than a little), however they are excellent speakers. I run them without a sub and have no complaints about the quality of the bass. I've ran these speakers as loudly as anyone would (no neighbors nearby), and the sound remains very clean at high volumes. Finally, these speakers are built very well; they look nice and will wear well. No problems with wood laminate peeling off which could be an issue with some speakers in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Josh W.

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Great sound. Get a better receiver.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Great sound. Get a better receiver and you will enjoy them much much more. Only thing I recommend is solid wiring.
customer_reviews.author: BBro

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound.  Gets ludacris loud while staying crystal clear.
customer_reviews.text: You have to hear it to believe it. I have built and bought speakers for a lot more money that have not sounded nearly this good. Great mid range and highs, with decent bass. They look great. No complaints about them at all! I am powering them with Pioneer's VSX-523.
customer_reviews.author: Apocalyptic Fab

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear sound and perfect for a medium sized Home Theater
customer_reviews.text: Elegant look, Crystal clear sound and perfect for a medium sized Home Theater. Need a Subwoofer though!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great Sounds and low price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty damn good sound considering the cost of the system. It has a quality that you would expect from a system that costs much, much more.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Kaya

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure you can find a better value at this price. Speakers sound great. Replaced my HTIB with these and a Sony STRDH550. I would recommend adding a sub for movies and music. Polk Audio PSW10 pairs well and is also a great value for the price. Very well constructed with a sleek appearance.
customer_reviews.author: pdidly34

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: The sound these speakers project is awesome. For the money, this was a great buy. I would recommend them to anyone looking for speakers.
customer_reviews.author: leslie sullenberger

customer_reviews.title: My next speakers will be again... Fluance
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speakers for 283.00, 2 floorstanding for 149.00 and the other 3 speakers for 114.00 plus taxes, Used/like new someone returned (idiot), using the yamaha receiver RX-V677 in neo surround/enhancer, I get amazing details in the same music that I listening every day...WOW incredible crisp and cleanest...the voice will not overcome the details in the music...My old 300 CDs sound are reborn again...good craftsmanship, no cheap plastic anywhere...UPS try to kill the speaker beating right and left, but they are double boxed with foam all around (cero damage)...all thanks to a youtube video testing the AVHTB speakers.
customer_reviews.author: A1Projektors

customer_reviews.title: fluance speakers
customer_reviews.text: great off name brand speakers for the price. was looking for used polks and ended up getting a new set of these instead!
customer_reviews.author: fat-duckie

customer_reviews.title: Hi guys, i still havent hear my speakers, ...
customer_reviews.text: Hi guys ,i still havent hear my speakers ,i cant find a reasonable affordable receiver. Any sugestions .loving my speakers ,give my place a different look
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Not for me!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return... Not sure what happened but set these speakers up to my amp and started playing music.. 15 minutes later @30% volume I smelled hot wires or circuits from my amp and shut everything down... Turned amp back on 15 minutes later and nothing... Tried other speakers and nothing so I sen these back - bought a different brand and new amp which are all working great... ONLY positive was how Fluance & Amazon handled the return - no hassles - no questions..
customer_reviews.author: S. Cooper

product_meta.title: Fluance SXHTB-BK High Definition Surround Sound Home Theater 5.0 Channel Speaker System Including Floorstanding Towers, Center and Rear Speakers (Black Ash)
feature_bullets: Expertly timbre matched 5 speaker system that will surround you with every brilliant nuance from the greatest soundtracks that define your life
Premium 1" neodymium balanced silk dome tweeters, ferrofluid cooled for vibrant high-frequency response; 4" poly-coated midrange drivers with butyl rubber surrounds for rich, clear sound performances
Powerful dual 6.5" woofers produce high definition sound and optimal low frequency response (fronts)
Precision-crafted audio-grade MDF wood construction for reduced cabinet resonance and reproduction of natural sound
Full lifetime parts and labor manufacturer's direct warranty with lifetime customer support

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars151 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
